item.title: Trans youth care ban vetoed by Kansas governor again
item.description: Kansas Governor Laura Kelly vetoed Senate Bill 63, which would have restricted gender-affirming care for transgender youth.

item.title: Musk staffer 'mistakenly' given ability to edit Treasury payment system, filings say
item.description: The filings also provided new insights into DOGE's ongoing mission with the Treasury Department.

item.title: Inflation increased in January, posing obstacle for Trump tariff plans
item.description: Consumer prices rose 3% in January compared to a year ago, data showed.

item.title: Full Ukrainian liberation from Russia 'unrealistic,' Hegseth tells allies
item.description: "The bloodshed must stop and this war must end," U.S. Defense Secretary Pete Hegseth said.

item.title: Musk's son 'Lil X' steals spotlight in the Oval Office
item.description: The billionaire has brought his four-year-old to numerous Washington events.
